Desc.entry: SGI is a worldwide buddhist movement of lay members based on Nichiren Daishonin's Buddhism and its teaching of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo which reveals an individual's greatest potential. In the teachings of Nichiren Daishonin there is a profound principle that Buddhism equals daily life. The emphasis in practising this Buddhism is to carry out a daily practice at home and to participate in the weekly meetings held throughout Sheffield. Is a registered charity.
